Texts.Chs: 把^orange;观察器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Watcher^reset; to the ^green;purple-armored scientist^reset; at the top floor of the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Powered stations are a ^green;huge productivity booster^reset;. With a ^orange;Watcher^reset; they are even more versatile! Try crafting a ^orange;Watcher^reset; in your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;观察器^reset;对于设备来说是非常重要的。它们会让^green;20格^reset;范围内的设备在你远离后还能持续工作。如果你离开了该星球，那么^orange;所有的观察器将会关闭^reset;你的SAIL目前只能监控这么多，不要过量使用。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Watchers^reset; are special. They will keep powered devices within their range ^gray;(20 blocks)^reset; running while you are away, planetside. ^red;Leaving a planet will reset all of your Watchers.^reset; Your SAIL can only track so many before it slows down.^red;Don't over-use them^reset;.
